name: Sofia Rodrigues
title: Founder & CEO
description: Maria's dream of bringing authentic Amazonian açaí to Aracaju became a reality with The King of Açaí Aju. Her passion for quality and healthy living drives the company's vision.

name: João Santos
title: Head of Operations
description: With a keen eye for logistics and a commitment to efficiency, João ensures that every ingredient is fresh and every operation runs smoothly, from sourcing to serving.

name: Carolina Souza
title: Creative Director
description: Carolina is the artistic mind behind our delightful bowl presentations and engaging customer experience. Her creativity adds a unique flair to every aspect of our brand.
